last_episode_to_air.name: Mint Choco Boom
last_episode_to_air.overview: When their ticket for free ice cream flies away, will Hank and Trash Truck lose their spot in line — and their shot at trying the shop's new flavor?

name: Trash Truck
overview: Six-year old Hank and his best pal, a giant trash truck, explore the world around them on fantastical adventures with their animal friends.

episodes.name: Four Wheels & Flies
episodes.overview: Trash Truck gets upset after learning he wasn't built to fly, so Hank, Walter, Donny and Ms. Mona help find a special way for him to take flight.

episodes.name: Slumber Party
episodes.overview: Hank invites Trash Truck, Walter and Donny to their first-ever sleepover! But will they all be okay in their backyard tent even if it's dark outside?

episodes.name: Movie Theater
episodes.overview: Everyone is excited to see their favorite superhero's new film, but technical difficulties arise. It's Trash Truck to the rescue to save movie night!

episodes.name: Olive Surfs
episodes.overview: Hank’s little sister Olive wants to learn how to surf, so Ms. Mona shares her tips and tricks and teaches the friends how to find the perfect wave.

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: Trash Truck heads to his first doctor’s visit with Hank after they both brush up against poison oak during a game of hide and seek.

episodes.name: New Shoes
episodes.overview: Hank's dad gets Hank and Trash Truck new shoes, but they smell funny and feel too weird and stiff! Can Ms. Mona help them get their old shoes back?

episodes.name: Hibernation Day
episodes.overview: Walter doesn't want to miss out on all the fun his friends will have while he's hibernating, so Hank and Donny try their best to keep him wide awake.

episodes.name: Highbeam
episodes.overview: Trash Truck, Walter and Donny get carried away while playing with Hank’s Highbeam action figure, then must come clean when they think it’s broken.

episodes.name: Sick Day
episodes.overview: Donny and Walter fill in when Trash Truck feels under the weather and can't finish his garbage pick-up route. But they end up making a bigger mess!

episodes.name: Trashimal
episodes.overview: Hank wishes he could live more like Trash Truck and his animal friends but realizes there are things he'll miss too much — like non-moldy meals!

episodes.name: Training Wheels
episodes.overview: With Trash Truck by his side, Hank learns how to handle his brand-new bike across town all on his own... even after his wobbly training wheels fall off.

episodes.name: Garbage Band
episodes.overview: Hank and friends can’t seem to learn how to whistle, so Ms. Mona shows them other fun ways to make music. Soon they end up forming their own band!

episodes.name: Share Day
episodes.overview: Just like his classmates, Hank wants to show off his Highbeam toy for Share Day. But Trash Truck helps him make a switch to share something special.

episodes.name: Ballet Recital
episodes.overview: First position, toe points, lifts and pirouettes! Trash Truck learns it all as Olive's new dance partner at his very first recital.

episodes.name: Trash Truck and the Toad
episodes.overview: Trash Truck meets a cute and curious toad during his morning routine and helps his new friend find a way back home to his family.

episodes.name: Lost Voice
episodes.overview: When Hank suddenly loses his voice, Walter and Donny fill a tin can with sounds from around town to make him a new one.

episodes.name: Dino Land
episodes.overview: The friends chase a tiny lizard into a pretend prehistoric world — where Hank's a cave boy, Trash Truck's a mammoth, and lizards are dino-sized!

episodes.name: Balloon Day
episodes.overview: How high can a balloon float? After a fun day with a couple of balloons they bought in town, Trash Truck and Hank try to find out!

episodes.name: Beach Day
episodes.overview: On a beach day with Hank’s family, Trash Truck catches a glimpse of life under the sea and makes a new friend even bigger than he is!

episodes.name: Honk-ups
episodes.overview: Trash Truck gets the "honk-ups" after drinking a whole bottle of grape soda, so his friends try every secret remedy to cure them.

episodes.name: Pranks
episodes.overview: Trash Truck and Hank use a toy spider to play pranks on their friends — but they accidentally cause some chaos with the neighbor’s cat!

episodes.name: Freeze Tag
episodes.overview: A game of freeze tag goes downhill when Trash Truck and pals get distracted by a sparkly new phone and start fighting.

episodes.name: The Dandelion
episodes.overview: With Ms. Mona as a referee, Hank, Trash Truck, Walter and Donny compete in a series of games to see who gets to make a wish on a dandelion.

episodes.name: Fishing Trip
episodes.overview: Grab the fishing poles, tackle box and a can of worms! Grandpa takes Hank and Trash Truck on a fishing trip and tries to reel in a big catch!

episodes.name: Kung Shoo
episodes.overview: Trash Truck always collects every single trash can in town. But he’ll need Ms. Mona to help him fight off the ninja flies swarming his last pick-up.

episodes.name: The Missing Trash Can
episodes.overview: When the family trash can goes missing from Hank's driveway, the friends collect all the clues to try and catch the trash can snatcher.

episodes.name: Trash Day
episodes.overview: No one in town notices Trash Truck while he’s making his usual rounds. Luckily, Hank is always willing to play at the end of Trash Truck's workday.

episodes.name: Mint Choco Boom
episodes.overview: When their ticket for free ice cream flies away, will Hank and Trash Truck lose their spot in line — and their shot at trying the shop's new flavor?
